document.masterDocTitle: Additional records of the genus Colletes Latreille (Hymenoptera: Apoidea: Colletidae) from Siberia, with a checklist of Russian species

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Additional records of the genus Colletes Latreille (Hymenoptera: Apoidea: Colletidae) from Siberia, with a checklist of Russian species

bibRefCitation.author: Radoszkowski
bibRefCitation.refString: Radoszkowski, O. (1891) Revision des armures copulatrices des males des genre Colletes. Horae Societatis Entomologicae Rossicae, 25 (1 / 2), 249 - 260.

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Colletes sidemii
Radoszkowski 1891
: 252
( type locality: “sur les bords de la riviere Sidémi (non loin de Vladivostok)”, Primorskiy Terr., Russia );
Kuhlmann & Proshchalykin 2011
: 18
.
